publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5233 John Lamont: Congratulations to Captain James Evansâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Captain James Evans of Eyemouth on being awarded the Merchant Navy Medal for his many years of service to the fishing fleet in Berwickshire; notes his vast experience as a captain and his tireless campaigning on fishing and maritime issues as well as his involvement in many other local organisations; considers Captain Evans to be a credit to the community he worked so hard to represent, and wishes him and his family well in their future endeavours.

S3M-5233 Congratulations to Captain James Evans (lodged on 18 November 2009) Nanette Milne*, Karen Gillon*, Mary Scanlon*, Alex Johnstone*, Bill Aitken*, David McLetchie*, Jamie McGrigor*, Jim Hume*, Aileen Campbell*, Elizabeth Smith*, Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*, Christine Grahame*, John Scott*, Jackson Carlaw*, Gil Paterson*
